summary: Male Argonian Follower, No DLC Required
descriptionHtml:
NO DLC REQUIRED

Nathro is an Argonian with a mysterious past ... not really, but it does help his credibility. He is a gifted liar.

Perks: Critical Shot, Savage Strike, Devastating Blow, Unhindered, Conditioning, Deadly Bash, Silence, Restoration Apprentice

Spells: Fast Healing

Combat Style: Very High Offense/Tank

Strengths: One handed, Block, and Archery

Lesser Attributes: Heavy armor, light armor, sneak, restoration, two handed
_________________________________________________________________________________________

Nathro is one of the most durable followers in the game. His healing spells allow him to stay in the fight for longer periods of time.

Set as essential, can be disabled if you want to watch a dragon eat a lizard. Poor Nathro.

Max Level = 81

He can be found in Windhelm cozy and warm in Candlehearth Hall.
__________________________________________________
INSTALLATION

Simply drag the contents of this folder into your Skyrim Data folder.

__________________________________________________

Thanks for downloading!
Once you go lizard...
author: DaveEscape
